title: Bug 102436: Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: The date/time value is stored incorrectly in the report design.
EB: The date value should have been validated by the UI or Model.
SR:
1. Enter an invalid date/time string that does not conform to the universal format or the system default locale format.
2. Save the report design.
3. Verify that the invalid date/time value is not accepted and is rejected by the UI or Model.
